Others: Anthony Davis went down with an eye injury in the third quarter and was replaced by Jaxson Hayes.
Hayes played 22 minutes, scored 12 points, and grabbed 6 rebounds, with the best plus-minus on the Lakers at +21.
The Lakers cruised to victory, outscoring the Raptors 70-48 in the second half.
JJ Redick discussed Hayes taking on a bigger responsibility in the game, praising his energy and impact.
